summary: The U.S. Coast Guard has several missions, including "defense readiness"—maintaining the training and capability to integrate with DOD's forces when needed. The defense readiness mission accounted for a small portion of Coast Guard vessel and aircraft deployments and associated expenses from FY 2011 through 2020. But the Coast Guard also supports DOD when deploying for its other missions, such as drug interdiction, polar ice operations...
title: Coast Guard: Information on Defense Readiness Mission Deployments, Expenses, and Funding
